title: Textile, 20th century
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: wax resist dyeing (batik) on plain weave
inscribed: Sabdang, Feb 9 '31, made in Java and printed, Endah Ma?a??Toeloeng Agoeng (written in lower corner)
description: Panel of cotton batik printed in diagonally-arranged pattern of hook-shaped motif known as "parang tuding" in reddish brown and accented with blue dots on tan. Because it is arranged along a diagonal, the pattern falls in the "garis mirig" category. One weft band with black stripe surrounded by a thin red strip on each side visible under batiked pattern.

tombstone.epitaph:
Textile, 20th century.
20th century. Medium: cotton
Technique: wax resist dyeing (batik) on plain weave. Gift of Frances Morris. 1951-111-19.
